tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Sensor_data (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    sensor_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Sensor_data (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    sensor_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Data_aggregation (
    aggregation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    aggregation_type VARCHAR(50),
    aggregated_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Data_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    aggregation_id INT,
    analysis_type VARCHAR(50),
    result VARCHAR(100),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE DataFlowLogs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    sensor_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_message TEXT
);
